title: X-Men Profiles - The Beast Collection
description:
This collection celebrates the one, the only Dr. Henry "Hank" McCoy, aka The Beast! X-Man, Avenger, Defender, genius and brute with a heart of gold and the soul of a poet - I mean how can you not love him? This pack contains:

X-Men (Uncanny X-Men) v1 01 (1963) - First appearance.

Amazing Adventures v2 11-17 (1971) - Mutation story arc + other tales

The Avengers v1 137, 151, 211 (1975, 1976, 1981) - Joins the Avengers as a provisional member, then is promoted to full member, and finally the issue where he leaves the Avengers.

Defenders v1 104 (1982) - Joins Defenders.

Beauty and the Beast (1984 Mini) - A nice miniseries with Beast and Dazzler.

X-Factor v1 01 (1986) - Forms X-Factor with the other four original X-Men.

X-Men v1 01 (1991) - X-Factor is consolidated with the X-Men once again.

Avengers Two - Wonderman and Beast 01-03 (2000) - a small mini that focuses on these best buddies from the Avengers.

New X-Men v1 114 (2001) - Second Mutation into a feline appearance.

Marvel Figurine Collection #16 - Beast (2005) - A book that focuses on the history of Beast with some storys and interviews and such, along with a nice timeline of critical moments.

X-Men Origins: Beast (2005) - A story about Beast's high school experience just before his initial meeting with Xavier.

I have elected not to add Beast-related content after 2005 since there are so many books he appears in that this torrent would swell pointlessly in size, lol. Thanks to all scanners for the original content as well as the first uploaders. Please seed and enjoy, thanks! :-)
